mapper.select: SELECT p.type AS planType, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM `User` u, `Plan` p WHERE u.plan_id = p.id GROUP BY p.type
SELECT status, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS cnt FROM Rental GROUP BY status
SELECT b.name AS brandName, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Rental r, Item i, Brand b WHERE r.item_id = i.id AND i.brand_id = b.id GROUP BY b.name

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.username AS username, CASE WHEN r.returned_at IS NULL THEN DATEDIFF(now(), r.return_due_at) ELSE DATEDIFF(r.returned_at, r.return_due_at) END AS overdueDate, r.status AS status, i.name AS itemName FROM Rental r, User u, Item i WHERE r.user_id = u.id AND r.item_id = i.id AND u.status_account = 'INACTIVE' AND r.status = 'OVERDUE'
